snippet.title: SNES Longplay [352] Ardy Lightfoot
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Longplay of Ardy Lightfoot, a platform game released on the Super Nintendo in 1993 in Japan and 1994 in Europe and USA. It was developed by ASCII and published by Titus in North America.

The protagonist Ardy Lightfoot is an anthropomorphic creature resembling a fox or cat. He is accompanied by his best friend Pec, a blue penguin. The attacks of Ardy consists of using your friend Pec as support (throwing it or using it to fly) or use a mirror curtain to defend.

The story of the game is that the sacred rainbow has shattered into seven pieces (in form of crystals) and it's up to Ardy to obtain them all again. Whoever collects all seven pieces will receive one wish. An evil king named Visconti has already gotten one piece and is searching for the others and Ardy need to prevent that from happening! Ardy is assisted by friends along the way like the elder (unknown name), Nina and a mysterious adventurer named Don Jacoby (a "Indiana Jones" of game). Very simple but fun game! Wink -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
